inlineContent.text: SoulverCore is a math engine that calculates day-to-day mathematical expressions.  It powers the popular Mac & iPad notepad calculator app
To calculate the result of a single mathematical expression, use
To customize the way your expression is interpreted, use
To customize the way a result is formatted, use
Sensible defaults for most use-cases (common tasks work out-of-the-box)
A high level of customizability (non-common tasks are possible, like adding new phrase functions & custom units)

abstract.text: A powerful natural language calculation engine
